description.value: Character is experienced in dealing diplomatically with divergent and alien cultures, and avoiding the subtle faux pas that can turn a negotiation into a bloodbath. Reduce penalty for interaction tests when dealing with Xenos or Non-Imperial NPCs by 20, once per encounter can reroll a failed Interaction Skill Test with such an NPC.
